oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 2003 Freedom Awards
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Clinton, Bill; Hooks, Benjamin L.; Hooks, Frances; Smith, Maxine; Ford, Harold, Jr.; National Civil Rights Museum; 2000s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Honorees and others on stage during the 2003 Freedom Awards at the National Civil Rights Museum. Former President Bill Clinton and Maxine Smith were honored. From left to right: Harold Ford, Jr., unidentified woman, Benjamin Hooks, Frances Hooks, Bill Clinton, Maxine Smith, unidentified man.
